uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'SLURM scontrol nodes' and not 'reason=' | stats distinctcount(Node), trend(distinctcount(Node), 1hour) | compare timeshift = auto

LINK_SEARCH_SETTINGS.linkSummaryInput: <title-text>Failed Checks</title-text>

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'SLURM scontrol nodes' or 'Log Source' like 'GPU %' | eval Node = if('Log Source' = 'SLURM scontrol nodes', substr(Node, indexOf(Node, ad)), substr(Entity, indexOf(Entity, ad), indexOf(Entity, compute) - 1)) | link includenulls = true 'Log Source', Node, Severity | addfields [ * | where 'Log Source' = 'SLURM scontrol nodes' | eventstats distinctcount(Node) as Nodes ], [ * | where 'Log Source' != 'SLURM scontrol nodes' | eventstats distinctcount('Log Source') as Checks, distinctcount(Node) as NodesChecked ], [ * | where 'Log Source' != 'SLURM scontrol nodes' and Severity != null and Severity != info | eventstats distinctcount('Log Source') as ChecksFailed, distinctcount(Node) as NodesFailed ] | eventstats ifnull(max(Nodes), 0) as Nodes, ifnull(max(Checks), 0) as Checks, ifnull(max(NodesChecked), 0) as NodesChecked, ifnull(max(ChecksFailed), 0) as ChecksFailed, ifnull(max(NodesFailed), 0) as NodesFailed | addfields [ * | where 'Log Source' != 'SLURM scontrol nodes' and Severity != info | eventstats count('Log Source') as 'Failed Checks' by Node, 'Log Source' ] | createtable name = 'Node Summary' select Node, 'Log Source' as Check, 'Failed Checks' | rename 'Log Source' as Check | fields target = ui -Nodes, -NodesChecked, -NodesFailed, -Checks, -ChecksFailed

'Log Source' = 'NVIDIA SMI Status' | link Time, 'Node Display Name' | stats pct('GPU Temperature', 95) as 'Temp. 95th %ile' | classify 'Start Time', 'Temp. 95th %ile', 'Node Display Name' as 'GPU Temperature'
'Log Source' like 'SLURM %que%' | stats distinctcount('Job ID') as jobs by 'Current State', Partition | sort -jobs

'Log Source' = 'SLURM Control Jobs' | link Partition, 'Job ID', 'Job Name' | stats max('CPU Requested (TRES)') as 'CPUs Requested', max('CPUs Allocated (TRES)') as 'CPUs Allocated', max('Generic Resources GPU Requested (TRES)') as gpureq, max('Generic Resources GPU Allocated (TRES)') as gpualloc, max('Memory Requested (TRES)') as memreq, max('Memory Allocated (TRES)') as memalloc, max('Nodes Requsted (TRES)') as nodesreq, max('Nodes Allocated (TRES)') as nodesalloc | eventstats distinctcount('Job Name') as 'Jobs by Partition', sum('CPUs Requested'), sum(memreq), sum(nodesreq), sum(gpureq) by Partition
'Log Source' like 'GPU %' | stats distinctcount(Entity), trend(distinctcount(Entity)) | compare timeshift = auto

'Log Source' = 'NVIDIA SMI Status' | link Time, 'Node Display Name' | stats pct('GPU Temperature', 95) as GpuTemp, pct('Clocks current graphics (MHz)', 95) as clkCurGraMhz, pct('Power Draw (W)', 95) as PwrDrwW, pct('Power Draw (W)', 50) as PwrDrwWAvg, pct('Clocks default_applications memory (MHz)', 95) as clkDefAppMemMhz, pct('GPU Utilization', 95) as gpuUtil, pct('Clocks default_applications graphics (MHz)', 95) as clkDefAppGraMhz, pct('Clocks current sm (MHz)', 95) as clkCurSmMhz, pct('GPU Temperature tlimit', 95) as GpuTempTlim, pct('GPU Count', 95) as GpuCou | classify 'Start Time', gpuUtil, 'Node Display Name', GpuTemp, clkCurGraMhz, PwrDrwW as 'GPU Utilization' | timestats avg(PwrDrwWAvg) by 'Node Display Name'
'Log Source' = 'SLURM scontrol nodes' | stats distinctcount('Host Name (Server)') as 'Configured SLURM Nodes', trend(distinctcount('Host Name (Server)')) | compare timeshift = auto
'Log Source' like 'SLURM %que%' | timestats span = 5minute distinctcount('Job ID') by 'Current State'
'Log Source' like 'SLURM %que%' | stats distinctcount('Job ID') as jobs by Partition, 'Current State' | sort -jobs

LINK_SEARCH_SETTINGS.linkSummaryInput: <title-text>Node Summary</title-text>

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like in ('GPU %', 'SLURM %') | eval nodename = substr(Entity, indexOf(Entity, ad), indexOf(Entity, compute) - 1) | link 'Log Source', nodename | addfields [ 'Log Source' like 'GPU %' and Severity != info | stats distinctcount(Entity) as failingnodes ] | addfields [ 'Log Source' like 'GPU %' | eventstats distinctcount(Entity) as totalnodes ] | rename 'Log Source' as Check | eventstats distinctcount(Check) as 'Failing Checks' by nodename | createtable name = nodegpuchk select nodename as Node, 'Failing Checks', Check

LINK_SEARCH_SETTINGS.linkSummaryInput: <title-text font-size="medium" color="#196F3D">Total Jobs</title-text> <title-text font-size="medium" color="#196F3D">Partitions, Jobs Per Partition, Status of jobs per partition, resources requested per partition, resources allocated per partition</title-text>

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'SLURM Accounting' and 'Task count' = null | link Partition, 'Job ID' | stats unique('Job Name') as JobName, unique('User Name') as User | eventstats distinctcount('Job ID') as 'Jobs in Partition' by Partition | eventstats distinctcount('Job ID') as 'Total Jobs in Cluster' | fields target = ui JobName, User, Partition, -'Job ID', 'Start Time', -'End Time', 'Jobs in Partition', 'Total Jobs in Cluster', -Count

'Log Source' = 'NVIDIA SMI Status' | link Time, 'Node Display Name' | stats pct('GPU Temperature', 95) as GpuTemp, pct('Clocks current graphics (MHz)', 95) as clkCurGraMhz, pct('Power Draw (W)', 95) as PwrDrwW, pct('Clocks default_applications memory (MHz)', 95) as clkDefAppMemMhz, pct('GPU Utilization', 95) as gpuUtil, pct('Clocks default_applications graphics (MHz)', 95) as clkDefAppGraMhz, pct('Clocks current sm (MHz)', 95) as clkCurSmMhz, pct('GPU Temperature tlimit', 95) as GpuTempTlim, pct('GPU Count', 95) as GpuCou | classify 'Start Time', gpuUtil, 'Node Display Name', GpuTemp, clkCurGraMhz, PwrDrwW as 'GPU Utilization'

'Log Source' like in (slurmd, '%smi') | link includenulls = true 'Job ID', Entity | where 'Job ID' != null | eventstats distinctcount(Entity) as 'Nodes per Job' by 'Job ID' | rename 'Group Duration' as 'Time Taken' | classify correlate = -*, 'Nodes per Job', Entity 'Start Time', 'Time Taken', 'Job ID', 'End Time' as 'Job Status'
'Log Source' like 'GPU %' and Severity != info | stats distinctcount('Log Source'), trend(distinctcount('Log Source')) | compare timeshift = auto

LINK_SEARCH_SETTINGS.linkSummaryInput: <title-text>HPC GPU Cluster</title-text> <title-text>Nodes</title-text> <title-text>CPUs</title-text> <title-text>Memory</title-text> <title-text>GPUs</title-text> <title-text>Node States</title-text>

uiConfig.queryString:
init { $cluster = 'octane-ord-non-restricted' } init { $cluster_prefix = '$cluster' || '-bm-gpu-h100-8-' } 'Log Source' = 'SLURM scontrol nodes' 
| link Node 

| eval 'Node' = replace(Node, '$cluster_prefix', '')
| stats latest('CPU Capacity') as 'CPU Capacity',
   latest('Memory Allocatable') as 'Memory Allocatable',
   latest('Host IP Address') as 'Node IP',
   latest('Node State') as 'Node State',
   latest('Partitions List') as 'Partitions List',
   latest('Generic Resource GPU Allocatable') as 'GPUs'

| eval  'Memory Allocatable' = unit( 'Memory Allocatable', gb)
| eventstats distinctcount(Node) as 'Number of Nodes',
   sum( 'CPU Capacity') as  'Total CPU Capacity',
   sum( 'Memory Allocatable') as 'Total Memory',
   sum('GPUs') as 'Total GPUs'
| eventstats distinctcount('Node State') as 'Node States'
| eventstats distinctcount(Node) as Nodes by 'Node State'
| createTable name = 'Nodes by State' 
   select Node,
   'Node State',
   Nodes as Count
| eval 'Cluster Name' = '$cluster' 
| classify 
    'Node State',
    Node,
    'Memory Allocatable',
    'CPU Capacity' as 'Node Summary'
| fields target = ui -'Cluster Name',
   -'Number of Nodes',
   -'Total CPU Capacity',
   -'Total Memory',
   -'Total GPUs',
   -'Node States'
'Log Source' like 'GPU %' and Severity != info | stats distinctcount(Entity), trend(distinctcount(Entity)) | compare timeshift = auto
'Log Source' = 'NVIDIA SMI Status' | timestats span = 15minute pct('GPU Temperature', 95) as tmp by 'Instance ID'

init { $cluster = 'octane-ord-non-restricted' } init { $cluster_prefix = '$cluster' || '-bm-gpu-h100-8-' } 'Log Source' = 'SLURM scontrol nodes' | extract field  = Message '(?P<nodefailed>.*)'
| link Node 
| eval 'Node' = replace(Node, '$cluster_prefix', '') 
| stats latest('CPU Capacity') as 'CPU Capacity',
   latest('Memory Allocatable') as 'Memory Allocatable',
   latest('Host IP Address') as 'Node IP',
   latest('Node State') as 'Node State',
   latest('Partitions List') as 'Partitions List',
   latest('Generic Resource GPU Allocatable') as 'GPUs' ,
   unique('nodefailed') as 'failed-reason'
| eval 'Memory Allocatable' = unit( 'Memory Allocatable', gb) 
| eventstats distinctcount(Node) as 'Number of Nodes',
   sum( 'CPU Capacity') as 'Total CPU Capacity',
   sum( 'Memory Allocatable') as 'Total Memory',
   sum('GPUs') as 'Total GPUs' | eventstats distinctcount('Node') by 'failed-reason'
| eventstats distinctcount('Node State') as 'Node States' 
| eventstats distinctcount(Node) as Nodes by 'Node State' 
| createTable name = 'Nodes by State' 
   select Node,
   'Node State',
   Nodes as Count 
| eval 'Cluster Name' = '$cluster' 
| classify 'Node State',
   Node,
   'Memory Allocatable',
   'CPU Capacity' as 'Node Summary' 
| fields target = ui -'Cluster Name',
   -'Number of Nodes',
   -'Total CPU Capacity',
   -'Total Memory',
   -'Total GPUs',
   -'Node States'

'Log Group' = octane and 'Log Source' = 'Linux Kernel Logs (fbit kmsg)' and Message like in ('NVRM%Xid%') | extract field = Entity 'octane-ord-non-restricted-bm-gpu-h100-8-(?P<AD>ad\d)\-(?P<GPU-hostID>\d+)\.compute.nrphxvcnc.oraclevcn.com' | extract field = Message '^NVRM.*Xid.*PCI:(?P<PCI Bus ID>[\w,:]+)\):\s+(?P<GPU XID>[\d,\w]+),\s+pid=(?P<OS Process ID>[\'\<unknown\>\',\d]+),\s+name=(?P<Process Name>[\<unknown\>,\S]+),\s+(?P<DetailsErr>.*$)' | lookup table = 'NVIDIA-XIDs' select Failure, 'Failure Type', 'HW Error', 'Driver Error', 'User App Error', 'System Memory Corruption', 'Bus Error', 'Thermal Issue', 'FB Corruption' using 'GPU XID' = '﻿XID' | link 'GPU-hostID', 'GPU XID' | stats latest(Failure) as Failure, unique('Hardware Error') as 'Hardware Error', unique('Failure Type') as FailureType, unique('Driver Error') as DriverError, unique('User App Error') as UserAppError, unique('System Memory Corruption') as SysMemCorrupt, unique('Bus Error') as BusError, unique('Thermal Issue') as ThermalIssue, unique('FB Corruption') as FbCorrupt | eventstats distinctcount('GPU XID') as 'Total Errors on Node', unique('GPU XID') as 'Error Codes' by 'GPU-hostID' | eventstats distinctcount(Entity) as 'Total Nodes with this Error' by 'GPU XID' | rename 'Start Time' as 'Error First Observed' | rename 'GPU-hostID' as 'Node Number' | rename 'GPU XID' as 'XID Code' | fields target = ui -'End Time', -Count, 'Node Number', Failure, 'XID Code', 'Error First Observed', 'Total Errors on Node', 'Error Codes', -'Hardware Error', -FailureType, -DriverError, -UserAppError, -SysMemCorrupt, -BusError, -ThermalIssue, -FbCorrupt | sort -'Total Errors on Node' | classify topcount = 300 correlate = * 'Error First Observed', 'Node Number', 'Total Errors on Node', 'Total Nodes with this Error', Failure as 'Node Correlation'
'Log Source' = 'SLURM scontrol nodes' and 'reason=' | stats distinctcount(Node), trend(distinctcount(Node), 1hour) | compare timeshift = auto
